mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", b.`name` AS "status", getUserName (c.create_user) AS "createUser", DATE_FORMAT( c.create_time, "%Y-%m-%d %T" ) AS "createTime" FROM oa_notice a LEFT JOIN sys_approval_list c ON a.id = c.bill_id AND c.`status` = '0', v_status b WHERE a.`status` = b.val AND a.org_id = #{param.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM oa_notice WHERE STATUS = 0 AND id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
